Class SeriesBackwardIndexerForLastBar

Namespace
FinScript.Data
Assembly
FinScript.Core.dll

A static helper to index series in reverse mode It always works with the last bar as a current bar index (SeriesBackwardIndexerForLastBar<T>) If you need to use a custom current bar index, SeriesBackwardIndexer<T>

Methods

For<T>(ISeries<T>)

Creates a backward indexer for specified series. The result backward indexer always works with last bar as a current bar CurrentBarIndex

public static SeriesBackwardIndexerForLastBar<T> For<T>(ISeries<T> series)

GetValue<T>(ISeries<T>, int)

Gets a value by reversal index starting from last item in series

Remarks

It is equal to:

  1. calling For<T>(ISeries<T>)
  2. calling SeriesBackwardIndexerBase<T>.Item(int)
